name: Max PC Safe Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .ENX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To encrypt a file (which will append the ENX extension):
Navigate to your file by choosing the folder that contains your file in the left pane and then selecting your file in the right pane.
Click "Encrypt," enter a password you want for your file and click OK.

If the encryption was successful, a confirmation message will appear, then click OK. You can choose to encrypt the file with different passwords multiple times. Each time, Max PC Safe will add another ENX extension to the file, e.g., file.pdf.enx.enx.enx.
To decrypt an ENX file and open it:
Click "Decrypt," enter the password you encrypted the file with and click OK.
A window should appear indicating the decryption was successful, then click OK. You can now open the file and view its contents.
You can also right-click the file you want to encrypt/decrypt, select Max PC Safe â†’ Encrypt File(s) / Folder(s).. or Decrypt File(s) / Folder(s).., and enter your password.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
